symbols.title: namespace sap.cux.home

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.LayoutType
symbols.description: Supported layout types for sap.cux.home.BaseContainer.

properties.name: sap.cux.home.LayoutType.Horizontal
properties.description: Panels are rendered horizontally, for example Pages and News

properties.name: sap.cux.home.LayoutType.SideBySide
properties.description: Panels are rendered side by side, for example To-Dos and Situaions, and Favorites, Recently Used and Frequently Used apps

properties.name: sap.cux.home.LayoutType.Vertical
properties.description: Panels are rendered vertically, for example Insights Tiles and Insights Cards

symbols.title: enum sap.cux.home.LayoutType

symbols.description: Supported News Types for sap.cux.home.NewsPanel.

properties.description: News is of type custom news feed

events.description: Fires whenever the menu item is pressed.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.NewsAndPagesContainer
symbols.description: Container class for managing and storing News and Pages.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

constructor.description: Constructor for the new News and Pages container.

methods.name: setColorPersonalizations
methods.description:
Sets property value for colorPersonalization. Overridden to update cached personalizations. Sets a new value for property "colorPersonalizations".
Color Personalizations for Spaces & Pages
When called with a value of "null" or "undefined", the default value of the property will be restored.
Default value is: []

methods.name: setIconPersonalizations
methods.description:
Sets property value for iconPersonalization. Overridden to update cached personalizations. Sets a new value for property "iconPersonalizations".
Icon Personalizations for Spaces & Pages
When called with a value of "null" or "undefined", the default value of the property will be restored.
Default value is: []

symbols.title: class sap.cux.home.NewsAndPagesContainer

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.ToDoPanel
symbols.description: Abstract Panel class for managing and storing To-Do cards.

properties.name: baseUrl
properties.description: Specifies the base URL for batching requests sent from the panel.

properties.name: countUrl
properties.description: Specifies the URL for fetching the count of requested to-do cards.

properties.name: dataUrl
properties.description: Specifies the URL from where the to-do cards should be fetched.

properties.name: targetAppUrl
properties.description: Specifies the URL of the target application associated with the to-do cards.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

methods.name: generateCardTemplate
methods.description: Generate a default card template for the Current Panel. An extended panel can have it's own template by overridding this method and providing a custom card template.

symbols.title: class sap.cux.home.ToDoPanel

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.ToDosContainer
symbols.description: Container class for managing and storing To-Do cards.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

methods.name: getSelectedKey
methods.description: Gets the selected key of the To-Dos container. If no selected key is set, it defaults to the first item.

methods.name: refreshData

returnValue.description: A promise that resolves when the section is successfully refreshed.

methods.description: Asynchronously refreshes the section by forcing all inner panels to be reloaded.

symbols.title: class sap.cux.home.ToDosContainer
